parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to submit the sim block request with the minimum number of characters in the ticketid and reason field.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to submit the sim block/unblock request with less than the minimum number of characters in the ticketid and reason field.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we are unable to submit the sim block/unblock request with the more than the maximum characters in the ticketid and reason field.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the sim unblock request is getting success while filling the mandatory fields alone in the sim block page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the sim block/unblock request fails while filling the optional fields alone in the sim block page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the alphabets are allowed to enter in the textfields present in the sim block page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the numerals are allowed to enter in the textfields present in the sim block page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the special characters are allowed to enter in the textfields present in the sim block page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to approve the sim unblock request through the admin approvals page in the CRM application.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to reject the pending sim block request in the pending approval page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether we can able to reject the pending sim unblock request in the pending approval page.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the valid alert message "Sim is in active state" is displayed while we try to submit the sim unblock request for the already unblocked MSISDN.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the valid alert message "Sim already blocked" is displayed while we try to submit the sim block request for the already blocked MSISDN.

parameter.name: testcaseDesc
parameter.value: To verify whether the valid alert message "Invalid ticketid" is displayed while giving the invalid ticketid in the sim block page.
